mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LIKES (LIKE_NO, USER_NO, POST_LIKE_NO, POST_LIKE_TYPE, LIKE_DATE) VALUES (seq_like_no.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{postNo}, 2, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LIKES WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND POST_LIKE_NO = #{postNo} AND POST_LIKE_TYPE=2
mapper.select: SELECT m.* FROM LIKES l, MOUNTAIN m WHERE l.POST_LIKE_TYPE=2 AND l.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND l.POST_LIKE_NO = m.MOUNTAIN_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mountain_search ( mountain_search_no, user_no, mountain_search_condition, mountain_search_content, location_no, difficulty_no, altitude_no, search_date ) VALUES ( seq_mountain_search_no.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{searchCondition}, #{searchKeyword}, #{locationNo}, #{altitudeNo}, #{difficultyNo}, SYSDATE )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MOUNTAIN_SEARCH WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND search_date = #{searchDate}
